snippet: Conservatives’ traditional-values script is being used against them as attitudes shift leftward on issues including same-sex marriage, marijuana and climate change.
abstract: Political Memo; conservatives’ traditional-values script is being used against them as attitudes shift leftward on issues including same-sex marriage, marijuana and climate change; nearly half of American adults are unmarried, 10 percent of opposite-sex married couples are interracial or inter-ethnic and acceptance of same-sex marriage has expanded with astonishing speed; Democrats profit politically from the sense that they welcome these cultural shifts while Republicans resist them.
lead_paragraph: Conservatives’ traditional-values script is being used against them as attitudes shift leftward on issues including same-sex marriage, marijuana and climate change.

headline.main: Democrats Seize on Social Issues as Attitudes Shift
headline.print_headline: Democrats Seize on Social Issues as Attitudes Shift

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
